summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4619 for the improvement of the alley in block 41, Bell & Denny's 3rd Addition, being the alley between 1st Avenue and 2nd Avenue, from Blanchard Street to Bell Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53737, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
